ЕБАНУТЫЕ VALVE ВАК НЕ ЗА ЧТО ВЫ УЕБКИ ТУПЫЕ

This is a game I have poured countless hours in (over 1000) and I can say it certainly has been a journey. As of right now I have played through every rank from Silver 1 to Master Guardian 1 and I can say I have learned a lot. This game makes you learn the mechanics to rank up so when you do you feel like you deserve it. However, there are some very big issues I have with CS. The devs seem to not care to much about the game, releasing game breaking updates without caution and having operations sparsely. This game is definitely fun and rewarding but could be even better if the devs just cared a little more.
